title: Beautiful 2 bed, 1 bath, 6 room unit, hardwd fls, patio in multi famil
posting_body: Spacious unit, living and dining rooms, plus sunroom
2 bedrooms, hardwood floors, sunroom, 1 bath with cabinet vanity,
Nice yard and patio in unit washer/dryer.
Located very convenient to Rt. 95, Rt. 2, shops supermarkets,
Available 9/1, no pets or smoking allowed.
Good credit and monthly income required is approx.
There is a real estate fee of $2,800.
Please reference: 2 bed in Belmont, $2,800 in your text or message
